title: 🎴 "When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love." - Marcus Aurelius
content:
Given an array of words, return the words that can be typed using letters of only one row on a keyboard. Extra credit: Include the option for a user to pick the type of keyboard they are using (ANSI, ISO, etc)!

Example:

$ oneRow(['candy', 'doodle', 'pop', 'shield', 'lag', 'typewriter']) $ ['pop', 'lag', 'typewriter']
